select bh.id, bh.user_id, bh.room_id, bh.browse_time, ri.room_number, ri.rent, ci.name as community_name, ci.province_name, ci.city_name, ci.district_name from browsing_history as bh left join room_info as ri on bh.room_id=ri.id and ri.is_deleted=0 left join community_info as ci on ri.community_id=ci.id and ci.is_deleted=0
where bh.is_deleted=0 and bh.user_id=#{id}
